1.content: Database schema creation for AI Help Assistant
1.details: Create 4 new tables: chat_sessions, chat_messages, knowledge_base_articles, escalation_requests. Ensure proper relationships with existing auth.users table and maintain backward compatibility.

2.details: Develop 6 edge functions: chat-message, chat-history, chat-create-session, chat-escalate, knowledge-base-search, admin-escalation-management. Include proper error handling, rate limiting, and security measures.

3.content: Knowledge base content creation and population
3.details: Create comprehensive knowledge base articles covering: member FAQs, volunteer process, event participation, badge system, portal navigation, troubleshooting. Structure for role-based access (member vs admin content).

4.details: Build responsive chat interface with: global availability, context awareness, conversation memory, mobile optimization. Integrate with existing portal design and authentication system.

5.content: Gemini AI integration and prompt engineering
5.details: Integrate Google Gemini API with: context-aware prompts, role-based responses, knowledge base integration, conversation memory, escalation triggers. Implement proper error handling and fallback mechanisms.

6.details: Add chat-related features to membership dashboard: chat history tab, escalation status display, quick help actions. Ensure seamless integration with existing 5 tabs.

7.details: Build comprehensive admin interface for: escalation queue management, conversation analytics, knowledge base editing, AI response configuration, admin notification settings.

8.details: Implement: JWT authentication, input sanitization, rate limiting, data encryption, audit logging, privacy compliance. Conduct security testing and vulnerability assessment.

9.details: Integrate AI assistant with existing systems: volunteer management guidance, event participation help, communication portal references, gamification explanations.

10.details: Ensure chat widget and admin interfaces work perfectly on: mobile devices, tablets, various screen sizes. Test touch interactions and responsive layouts.

11.details: Implement conversation tracking: usage analytics, response accuracy metrics, escalation patterns, member satisfaction indicators. Create admin dashboard for insights.

12.details:
✅ Database migration applied successfully (639-line SQL with 4 tables, RLS policies, 15 knowledge base articles)
